text: Elizabeth Moore (15 September 1944 - 13 August 1976) was a British sculptor , known for working in the properties for various films. ==Biography== Some of Moore's best-known credits include 2001: A Space Odyssey (1968), A Clockwork Orange (1971), and Star Wars (1977) (where she sculpted C-3PO and stormtrooper helmets). On , while working on A Bridge Too Far (1977), Moore died in the Netherlands in a road accident, in a car driven by John Richardson.http://www.brianmuirvadersculptor.com/liz-moore---a-tribute.html ==See also== *2001: A Space Odyssey *A Clockwork Orange *Star Wars *John Richardson == References == http://www.2001italia.it/2013/05/making-starchild- in-2001-tribute-to-liz.html?m=1 ==Bibliography== ==External links== Category:1976 deaths Category:1944 births Category:20th-century British sculptors Category:British women sculptors Category:British women painters Category:20th-century British painters Category:Road incident deaths in the Netherlands Category:20th-century British women artists
title: Liz Moore
